blog.name: acepalindrome
blog.title: you're going to be something extraordinary
blog.description: Hello, this is Palindrome! I'm currently doing my best to pretend that I'm a functional and well adjusted adult, with varying levels of success! Around this neck of the woods you'll find history stuff, nature stuff, whatever fandoms I'm into at the moment, fanfics I write when I can muster up the energy, the occasional mental breakdown and a variety of fun facts I come across or things I find interesting. Feel free to follow or drop me a line, I promise I'm quite tame.

summary: Pub Draw 4, feat. Aquinth, this time around I actually had a good bunch of references from his Secret World in-game face, so the...
caption:
Pub Draw 4, feat. Aquinth, this time around I actually had a good bunch of references from his Secret World in-game face, so the trick was trying to replicate that plausibly. Still needs some work, but off to a decent start~

Coloured Face

reblog.comment:

tags: like I'm genuinely sorry that I made people mad!!
summary: hey, can you stop whinging about ships you don't like and then tagging it with the ship? thanks
question: hey, can you stop whinging about ships you don't like and then tagging it with the ship? thanks
answer: Hi yeah so…the only posts in which I can recall “whinging” about ships are that one about people shipping beau and fjord (which I have NO remorse for) that I couldn’t have tagged in a ship tag bc one does exist… and second, that one about widojest which I tagged in the critical role tag but did NOT tag as widojest. I know that one made a lot of people WAY madder than I intended and I’m sorry that it did…so I deleted the post. Idk what else u expect me to do? Like this isn’t some repeated offense on my part? I made ONE post about a ship and when it upset people I deleted it…like yeah my bad? but also? like what more do you want? a formal apology for making fun of a ship? I’m ??

I know that one made a lot of people WAY madder than I intended and I’m sorry that it did…so I deleted the post. Idk what else u expect me to do? Like this isn’t some repeated offense on my part? I made ONE post about a ship and when it upset people I deleted it…like yeah my bad? but also? like what more do you want? a formal apology for making fun of a ship? I’m ??

I know that one made a lot of people WAY madder than I intended and I’m sorry that it did…so I deleted the post. Idk what else u expect me to do? Like this isn’t some repeated offense on my part? I made ONE post about a ship and when it upset people I deleted it…like yeah my bad? but also? like what more do you want? a formal apology for making fun of a ship? I’m ??

tags: the latest taz reminded me that i had this idea and now i want it more than ever
summary: We all talk a lot about wanting (more than?) one of the McElroys to guest on Critical Role, and my favourite idea for this that...
body: We all talk a lot about wanting (more than?) one of the McElroys to guest on Critical Role, and my favourite idea for this that I just came up with is that they should play Matt’s homebrew Lingering Soul class, so that they can just. play a ghost. you know, doing regular ghost stuff.

reblog.comment: We all talk a lot about wanting (more than?) one of the McElroys to guest on Critical Role, and my favourite idea for this that I just came up with is that they should play Matt’s homebrew Lingering Soul class, so that they can just. play a ghost. you know, doing regular ghost stuff.

trail.content_raw: We all talk a lot about wanting (more than?) one of the McElroys to guest on Critical Role, and my favourite idea for this that I just came up with is that they should play Matt’s homebrew Lingering Soul class, so that they can just. play a ghost. you know, doing regular ghost stuff.
trail.content: We all talk a lot about wanting (more than?) one of the McElroys to guest on Critical Role, and my favourite idea for this that I just came up with is that they should play Matt’s homebrew Lingering Soul class, so that they can just. play a ghost. you know, doing regular ghost stuff.

summary: I like to imagine the live chat for Cr are ghosts following around the mighty nein. So basically, they cannot be seen my the...
body:
I like to imagine the live chat for Cr are ghosts following around the mighty nein. So basically, they cannot be seen my the nien, but they can see each other.

And whenever they start freaking out I imagine them just running around in circles around the characters and screeching.

reblog.comment:
